title: Documentation crops description of some configuration properties
body:
### Describe the bug

See https://quarkus.io/version/main/guides/hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch#quarkus-hibernate-search-orm-coordination-outboxpolling_quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.coordination.entity-mapping.outbox-event.uuid-type

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/412878/b497cfbf-c1d7-4779-812b-ae836b9de5bf)

This may or may not be related to the handling of multiple configuration properties added in #34514

### Expected behavior

The description of each configuration property should be fully visible

### Actual behavior

The description of some configuration properties is cropped to only show the first line (see screeshot above)

### How to Reproduce?

See https://quarkus.io/version/main/guides/hibernate-search-orm-elasticsearch#quarkus-hibernate-search-orm-coordination-outboxpolling_quarkus.hibernate-search-orm.coordination.entity-mapping.outbox-event.uuid-type

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
